title: Lightweight Metal Material Design: Fundamentals of Mg-Li Alloy Optimization

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary materials science and chemistry knowledge, along with simple data analysis abilities
context.additional_context: A blended instructional model using digital devices and online platforms, simplifying real-world material design cases for educational implementation.

learning_goals: Learners can explain the key properties of Mg-Li alloys (density, strength, corrosion resistance).
Learners can interpret SHAP analysis results to identify key elements influencing alloy design.
A multi-objective optimization strategy can be applied to evaluate the performance balance of lightweight materials
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
